XXrabhramu:3: bhujavanapavanāstaprasthabandhaṃ girīṇāṃ bhavatu bhayaharaṃ vas tāṇḍavaṃ herukasya //
XXrabhramu:6: iha bhāvanādhikṛto mantrī prātar utthāya hṛdayārkanyastanijabījaḥ kṛtamukhaśaucādiḥ oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā iti sthānātmayogarakṣāṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpādisurabhitāṃ dhyānabhūmiṃ praviśya, sukhāsane paryaṅkam ābhujya, arghaṃ parijapya,
XXrabhramu:7: hṛnmantrakiraṇākṛṣṭam abhimukham ākāśe saparivāraṃ bhagavantam avalokya,
XXrabhramu:8: hṛdbījanirgatābhir gauryādidevībhir aṣṭābhiḥ pūjayet. tatra gaurī śaśinaṃ
XXrabhramu:9: bibharti, caurī raviṃ, vettālī jalam, ghasmarī palalam, pukkasī candanam,
XXrabhramu:10: śabarī madhu, caṇḍālī ḍamarukaṃ vādayati, ḍombī kaṇṭhalagnā puruṣāyate.
XXrabhramu:11: tatas tasyaiva bhagavato 'grataḥ pāpadeśanādikam iti kuryāt -
XXrabhramu:13: sarvam ātmanaḥ pāpaṃ bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratideśayāmi,
XXrabhramu:14: sarvabuddhabodhisattvāryapṛthagjanānāṃ sarvakuśalam anumode, sarvaṃ cātmanaḥ kuśalam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi. eṣo 'ham ā bodher buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam. dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi samagraṃ mahāyānam. saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmy
XXrabhramu:15: avaivartikabodhisattvagaṇam. aho batāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ abhisaṃbudheya sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe buddhabodhau pratiṣṭhāpanāya. eṣo 'ham anuttaraṃ bodhimārgam āśrayāmi yad uta vajrayānam.
XXrabhramu:18: kleśapratipakṣamārgopasaṃhārākārām upekṣāṃ ca bhāvayet. tataḥ sarvadharmān manasālambya vicārayet ḥ cittam evaitat tena tenākāreṇa bhrāntaṃ pratibhāsate yathāsvapne.
XXrabhramu:20: nāsti cittād bāhyaṃ cittagrāhyam. grāhyābhāvāc cittam api grāhakaṃ na bhavati. tasmāc cittaśarīrāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, teṣāṃ grāhyagrāhakaśūnyatā paramārtha iti. evam ekāntena niścitya bhrāntisamāropitaṃ bhrānticihnaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ākāraṃ vihāya teṣāṃ prakṛtim eva kevalām advayavijñaptilakṣaṇāṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśāṃ
XXrabhramu:21: śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganopamām anantāṃ paśyet. idam ucyate pāramārthikaṃ
XXrabhramu:22: bodhicittaṃ lokottaraṃ śūnyatājñānaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ nirvikalpam. tatas tan mantreṇādhitiṣṭhet oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham.
XXrabhramu:23: saiva bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā, saiva paramā rakṣā.
XXrabhramu:24: tatas tanniṣyandabhūtām ākāravatīṃ rakṣāṃ śuddhalaukikajñānasvabhāvāṃ bhāvayet.
XXrabhramu:25: repheṇa sūryaṃ purato vibhāvya tasmin ravau hūṃbhavaviśvavajram /
XXrabhramu:26: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayec ca prākārakaṃ pañjarabandhanaṃ ca //
XXrabhramu:29: vajrapañjaram, adhastād vajramayīṃ bhūmim ārasātalaviracitāṃ paśyet. tato raviviśvavajrābhyāṃ raśmībhūya diśi diśi spharitvā ghanībhūya bahir dūre
XXrabhramu:31: tatas tanniṣyandatayaiva viśuddhāni pañca mahābhūtāni cintayet.
XXrabhramu:32: tatrākāśamahābhūtaṃ dharmodayākhyaṃ mahāvajradharasvabhāvaṃ śaracchaśadharadhavalam adhaḥ sūkṣmam upari viśālaṃ trikoṇam antar gaganasvarūpaṃ abhyantarodgataviśvadaIakamalakarṇikāvasthitavipulaviśvavajram.
XXrabhramu:33: tadvedikāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni caturmaṇḍalākārāṇi caturdevīsvabhāvāny upary upari paśyet. ādau laṃkāreṇa māhendramaṇḍalaṃ caturasraṃ pītaṃ koṇeṣu triśūkavajrāṅkam. tato vaṃkāreṇa vāruṇaṃ vartulaṃ sitaṃ ghaṭāṅkam.
XXrabhramu:34: tato raṃkāreṇāgneyaṃ trikoṇaṃ raktaṃ koṇeṣu rephāṅkam. tato yaṃkāreṇa vāyavyaṃ dhanurākāraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ koṭidvaye calatpatākāṅkam. bhāvakas tu tadānīṃ tad eva lokottarajñānaṃ (BhrHe 161) vyāpakatvena sthitam. tato viśvavajravedikāmadhye caturmahābhūtapariṇāmajaṃ
XXrabhramu:35: pariśuddhabuddhakṣetrasaṃkṣeparūpaṃ mahāmokṣapuraṃ vairocanasvabhāvaṃ nānāratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāram aṣṭābhiḥ śmaśānaiḥ sarvalokadhātunairātmyasūcakaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dhyāyāt.
XXrabhramu:41: paramaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmair upahāraiś ca harṣaṇam //
XXrabhramu:48: tatra madhyāsanasyopari pañcadaśabhiḥ svaraiś candramaṇḍalam ādarśajñānasvabhāvam, tadupari catustriṃśadvyañjanaiḥ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ
XXrabhramu:51: cintayet. tato bījadvayād yoginīcakrākāreṇa sarvatathāgatān saṃsphārya,
XXrabhramu:52: tān saṃhṛtya, taiḥ sahaikīkṛtaṃ bījaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānam, tataś candrasūryacihnabījapariṇāmajaṃ bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ vakṣyamāṇavarṇākṛticihnādinā śrīherukarūpeṇāvirbhūtaṃ tathaiva nairātmyāśliṣṭakandharaṃ suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānātmakaṃ paśyet. iti
XXrabhramu:55: jvalad bījadvayaṃ rāgāt padmāntaḥ praviśad dravet //
XXrabhramu:56: tato vajrī mahārāgād vilīya saha vidyayā /
XXrabhramu:60: uṭṭha bharāḍo karuṇamaṇu pukkasi mahuṃ paritāhi /
XXrabhramu:63: tojjha vihuṇṇe marami haüṃ uṭṭhahi tuhuṃ hevajja /
XXrabhramu:65: loa nimantia suraapahu suṇṇe acchasi kīsa /
XXrabhramu:66: haüṃ caṇḍālī viṇṇamami taï viṇu uhami na dīsa //
XXrabhramu:67: indīālī uṭṭha tuhuṃ haüṃ jāṇami tuhu citta /
XXrabhramu:68: aṃhe ḍombī cchea maṇu mā karu karuṇavicchitta //
XXrabhramu:69: atha gītikānurodhāc candradravasaṃhārajābhyāṃ tatkālajaravimaṇḍalasthitābhyām aṃkārahūṃkārābhyāṃ devatānāṃ cihnadehādikam ākāśopamaṃ māyopamaṃ ca niścitya, tatpariṇāmayoḥ karttikapālayoḥ saṃyuktayor dṛḍhasamādhirūpayor garbhe tad eva
XXrabhramu:70: (BhrHe 164) bījadvayaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānasvabhāvaṃ paśyet. tata eva spharaṇayogena yoginīcakrākārānantatathāgatamayaṃ cittādhīnaṃ ca viśvaṃ nirūpya saṃharaṇayogena sarvaṃ tan māyopamaṃ gaganopamaṃ ca parijñāya dvitīyaravicihnabījapariṇāmajaṃ śrīherukam ātmānaṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:85: cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhā ca haste rucaka mekhalam //
XXrabhramu:88: pṛthivī varuṇa vāyuś ca tejaś candrārka eva ca /
XXrabhramu:92: atha bhagavato hṛtsūryasthitakapālasūrye hūṃkāram, bhagavatyās tu hṛccandrasthitakarttimuṣṭicandre aṃkāraṃ cintayet. tato 'sya śrotre
XXrabhramu:93: nairātmyām, cakṣuṣi vajrām, ghrāṇe guhyagaurīm, (BhrHe 167) jihvāyāṃ
XXrabhramu:94: vāriyoginīm, kāyendriye vajraḍākīm, manasi nairātmyām adhimuñcet. etad eva vajrādipañcakaṃ yathākramaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaskandheṣu,
XXrabhramu:96: rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāyataneṣu bāhyagaurī caurī vettālī ghasmarī bhūcarī khecarī, pṛthivyaptejovāyudhātuṣu pukkasī śabarī caṇḍālī
XXrabhramu:97: ḍombī, kāyavākcitteṣu bhūcarīkhecarīnairātmyāḥ, māṃse pukkasī, rudhire
XXrabhramu:98: śabarī, śukre caṇḍālī, majjamedayor ḍombī, carmaṇi sapta bodhyaṅgāni,
XXrabhramu:99: asthiṣu satyacatuṣṭayam. evaṃ devatābhiḥ sakalīkṛtya tadaparāḥ śuddhīr adhimuñcet.
XXrabhramu:102: mukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣās tu tribhis tattvais trilocanaḥ /
XXrabhramu:103: pañca mudrā jināḥ pañca kruddho duṣṭānuśāsanam //
XXrabhramu:109: tadanu svahṛdbījaraśmispharaṇāṅkuśair daśadiggatāṃs tathāgatān ākṛṣya nabhasi saṃsthāpya tān aṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjya
XXrabhramu:110: abhiṣiñcantu māṃ sarvatathāgatāḥ iti prārthayet. taiḥ śrīherukarūpāpannaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtapañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśair abhiṣicyate. abhiṣicyamānasya śirasi bhagavān akṣobhya utpadyate, puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ kuṅkumavṛṣṭiś ca bhavati,
XXrabhramu:111: dundubhiśabdaś ca śrūyate, rūpavajrādibhiḥ saṃpūjyate, vajragītyā locanādibhiḥ stūyate.
XXrabhramu:112: ity ādiyogo nāma samādhiḥ, svābhāvikaś ca kāyaḥ.
XXrabhramu:115: caturānandabhāg viśva hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
XXrabhramu:119: khagamukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me //
XXrabhramu:120: tataḥ oṃ śī 3 ha 3 svāhā iti ratim ārabhet. tataḥ kamalodarapatitacandradravabindupariṇāmena gaṃkāreṇa niṣpannāṃ gaurīṃ kṛṣṇavarṇāṃ karttirohitadharāṃ pūrvadvārāsanacandre cintayet. tathā caṃkāreṇa caurīṃ māñjiṣṭhavarṇāṃ kṛpīṭaśūkaradharāṃ dakṣiṇadvārāsanacandre, tathā vaṃkāreṇa vettālīṃ
XXrabhramu:121: kanakavarṇāṃ kūrmakapāladharāṃ paścimadvārāsanacandre, tathā ghaṃkāreṇa ghasmarīṃ maraktābhām. bhujagayogapātrīdharām uttaradvārāsanacandre, tathā paṃkāreṇa pukkasīm indranīlanibhāṃ keśariparśudharāṃ aiśānakoṇāsanacandre,
XXrabhramu:122: tathā śaṃkāreṇa śabarīṃ candrakāntanibhāṃ bhikṣukhikkhirikādharām āgneyakoṇāsanacandre, (BhrHe 169)
XXrabhramu:123: tathā laṃkāreṇa caṇḍālīṃ nabhaḥśyāmāṃ cakralāṅgaladharāṃ naiṛtikoṇāsanacandre, tathā ḍaṃkāreṇa ḍombīṃ karburavarṇāṃ vajratarjanikādharāṃ vāyavyakoṇāsanacandre dhyāyāt.
XXrabhramu:126: atha parito niṣpannaṃ maṇḍalam avalokya hṛdbījakiraṇāṅkuśair jñānamaṇḍalam
XXrabhramu:127: ākṛṣya, pūrvadvārābhimukham antarīkṣe 'vasthāpya, aṣṭānanahūṃkārair vighnān utsārya, arghapādyaṃ
XXrabhramu:128: jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ ity ebhir yathākramam ākarṣaṇapraveśanabandhanavaśīkaraṇāni kṛtvā,
XXrabhramu:129: samayajñānamaṇḍalayor ekalolībhāvaṃ vibhāvya, hṛnmantrakiraṇaiḥ sarvatathāgatān ākṛṣya saṃpūjya prārthya tayor abhiṣekaṃ dāpayet.
XXrabhramu:130: abhiṣicyamānānām abhiṣekajinaḥ śirasi jāyate. atra ślokau:
XXrabhramu:131: pukkasyādyāś catasras tu gauryādyāś ca yathākramam /
XXrabhramu:136: tato devatātattvaṃ manasikuryāt. iha sarvadharmāḥ kāyavākcittajñānaiḥ
XXrabhramu:137: saṃgṛhītāḥ. teṣāṃ kāyādīnāṃ yā dharmatā vijñaptimātratā dvayaśūnyatā
XXrabhramu:138: tasyāḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ yathāyogaṃ dvārapālīnāṃ tattvam. tasyā eva śūnyatāyāḥ samyagjñānaṃ niṣprapañcam anāsravā prajñā vajrayānam anuttaraṃ yathāyogaṃ pukkasyādīnāṃ catasṛṇāṃ tattvam. tasyaiva vajrayānasya phalaṃ
XXrabhramu:140: tataḥ svahṛdbījād aṣṭau pūjādevīḥ saṃsphārya tāsāṃ spharaṇameghair gaganam āpūrya sanāyakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pūjayet. tato māyopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya gītidvayena bhagavantaṃ stūyāt.
XXrabhramu:146: athāntarīkṣe hūṃkāreṇa vajraṃ vicintya, tasyādhastād āḥkāreṇa padmam,
XXrabhramu:147: tanmadhye praṇavāṅkitāni dravyāṇi, vajrapadmasamāyogād agnijvālanam, tena teṣāṃ tāpanam, pākād dravīkṛtya jñānasūryīkaraṇād dyotanam, tatkiraṇair daśadiksarvatathāgatānāṃ rūpadarśanam, tajjñānabījebhyas tair eva kiraṇair ākṛṣya jñānāmṛtaṃ teṣu saṃpātya samarasīkuryāt. evaṃ tāny amṛtīkṛtya
XXrabhramu:148: tryakṣareṇādhiṣṭhāya hūṃkāreṇa jihvāyāṃ śubhravajram, hṛtsūrye ca maṇḍalam
XXrabhramu:149: adhimucya, tair amṛtair ātmānaṃ maṇḍalaṃ ca saṃtarpayet.
XXrabhramu:150: mātṛcakre pure ramye bhāvayed īdṛśaṃ prabhum /
XXrabhramu:153: iti maṇḍalarājāgrī nāma dvitīyaḥ samādhiḥ, sāṃbhogikaś ca kāyaḥ.
XXrabhramu:154: tato gaurīṃ caurīṃ yāvan maṇḍalādhipatiṃ pratyekam anupūrvyā daśasu dikṣu nirantaraṃ saṃsphārya, sattvānām arthaṃ kṛtvā, teṣv eva saṃhṛtya,
XXrabhramu:155: kṛtakṛtyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ maṇḍalādhipatiṃ ca niṣprapañcasukhasamarpitaṃ paśyet.
XXrabhramu:156: tatra gaurī kāyasya bhūtapratyavekṣāyāṃ sattvān vyavasthāpayati, caurī
XXrabhramu:157: cittasya, vettālī vācaḥ, ghasmarī jñānasya, pukkasī kāyasya samyagjñāne,
XXrabhramu:158: śabarī cittasya, caṇḍālī vācaḥ, ḍombī jñānasya. maṇḍaleśvaras tu mahāvajradharapade sattvān
XXrabhramu:160: kṛṣṇaṃ raktaṃ tataḥ pītaṃ harin nīlaṃ sitaṃ kramāt /
XXrabhramu:162: iti karmarājāgrī nāma tṛtīyaḥ samādhiḥ, nairmāṇikaś (BhrHe 173) ca kāyaḥ.
XXrabhramu:163: bhāvanākhinno mantraṃ japet. samaṇḍalam ātmānaṃ devatārūpeṇāvirbhūtaṃ
XXrabhramu:164: vicintya oṃ deva picuvajra hūṃ 3 phaṭ svāhā
XXrabhramu:165: iti hṛtsūrye trayodaśa mantrākṣarāṇy ūrdhvaśiraskāni pradīpavaj jvalanti maṇḍalībhūtāni manasābhilikhya, tāny eva vācayan vajravācā krodhavācā vā
XXrabhramu:166: japet. sarvamukhebhyaḥ sarvadevīmukhebhyaś ca mantram uccarantam adhimuñcet. iyataiva svadevatāyā aṣṭaguṇo jāpaḥ sarvadevīnāṃ ca
XXrabhramu:170: ebhir labheya kuśalair lambhayeyaṃ ca taj jagat //
XXrabhramu:171: caryā saṃbodhaye yā ca saṃbuddhānāṃ ca yā punaḥ /
XXrabhramu:172: varṇitā bodhivajreṇa sā caryāstu dvayī mama //
XXrabhramu:173: tataḥ sanāyakaṃ maṇḍalaṃ pūrvavat saṃpūjya, svahṛnmantre devīr antarbhāvya, ādhāramaṇḍalam ativistīrṇam adhimucya, (BhrHe 174) catvāri mahābhūtāni pukkasyādisvabhāvāni niścitya, hevajrāhaṃkareṇotthāya tathaiva viharet. madhyāhnapradoṣasandhyayor dhyānagṛhaṃ praviśya pūrvavad ādhāramaṇḍalaṃ tanmadhyāsane cātmānaṃ samāpannāṣṭānanahevajrarūpaṃ jhaṭiti
XXrabhramu:174: dṛṣṭvā, hṛdbījaniścāritāś ca devīr yathāsthānaṃ niveśya, sarvamaṇḍalam ānandamayaṃ dhyātvā, pūjāstutyamṛtāsvādaṃ jāpādikaṃ ca kuryāt. nidrākāle ṣaḍaṅgayogaṃ sahajānandayogaṃ vābhimukhīkṛtya supyāt.
XXrabhramu:175: caturdevīgītisaṃcoditaś ca nidrāta uttiṣṭhet. utthāya sarvaṃ pūrvavat
XXrabhramu:176: kuryāt. evaṃ pratyahaṃ yāvat siddhinimittāni paśyati. tāni dṛṣṭvā yathātantram abhimatasiddher upāyam anutiṣṭhed iti.
XXrabhramu:177: guruguṇadhanadhāmnaḥ sādhanaṃ herukasya bhramaharam abhidhāya spaṣṭam aṣṭānanasya /
XXrabhramu:179: kuśalam idam avāptaṃ yan mayā janmabhājāṃ niravadhihitahetus tena vajrī jinaḥ syām //
